Laplace MechanismÂ¶

The laplace mechaism is another great mechanism for differential privacy. To use, call the lapmech function

lapmech(data, file_name, epsilon, f, sample_size=10, delta_f=None)

The laplace mechansim has all of the parameters as the exponential mechanism does other than r.
